üìã How to Choose & Implement

Design Symbols Explained:

2
Number "2": Represents "2" apps (Data Analyzer, Clinical Calculator)
üìä
Bar Charts/Graphs: Represents statistics and data analysis
‚ù§Ô∏è
Heartbeat/Medical Cross: Represents healthcare and medical relevance

Implementation Steps:

  1. Choose your favorite design from the options above
  2. Copy the SVG file name (favicon.svg, favicon-option2.svg, etc.)
  3. Update HTML files to reference the favicon: 
    <link rel="icon" type="image/svg+xml" href="/favicon.svg">
<link rel="apple-touch-icon" href="/favicon.svg">
  4. Add to all pages:
    • index.html (root)
    • packages/clinical-calculator/index.html
    • packages/data-analyzer/index.html
  5. Commit and push: 
    git add public/favicon*.svg
git commit -m "Add favicon designs"
git push
  6. Hard refresh your browser (Ctrl+Shift+R or Cmd+Shift+R) to see the new icon
